tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  log_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INTEGER,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  details JSON
);

CREATE TABLE user_activities_audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(255),
    activity_details TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    details JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE audit_policies (
    policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    created_by UUID NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE audit_log ( 
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  user_id INT NOT NULL, 
  activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
  detail TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE user_profile ( 
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
  role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE user_activity ( 
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  user_id INT NOT NULL, 
  activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE security_policy ( 
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  policy_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  description TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_regulation ( 
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  regulation_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  description TEXT 
)
